text:
Hello! Hello boys and girls! Can you see me?
No! Where am I?

And Buuuuh! I am here! But oh, look, where
is my body? I haven´t got any arms or legs!

UUU! Where are my legs? Oh, hey! Look! Legs,
haha! Oh yeah, it ´s a leg, hehey. Say with

me come on! It´s a leg, it´s a leg, it´s
a leg and again it´s a leg, it´s a leg,

it´s a leg. Haha, one more time. It´s a
leg, it´s a leg, it´s a leg! Yeah! But how

many legs? Yeah, two legs! They are my two
legs, so come here! Come on, come on! Yeah!

Oh, that´s better. Look, I´ve got legs.
Where are my arms? Hmmm. Oh, hehey, look,

my arms! Arms! Hey, arms! They are my arms!
So come here come on! Oh, heheaho! That´s

better, great! Look, I´ve got two legs and
two arms. But wait a minute! Oh, no! I am

still missing my body. Where is my body? Body!
Body! Hey, come here! Come on, yeah. Haha.

Hahaha! That´s better, look! Hehey!
Maggie: It´s all Maggie magic!

Steve: Yeah! Can you see me? Yeah! Look, I´ve

Do it again!
